seed_messages.welcome: Welcome to Luvatrix Engineering. This server is our operating system for onboarding, decisions, delivery, quality gates, and project memory.
seed_messages.server-map: Use channel categories by purpose: 00 onboarding, 01 planning, 02 agile boards, 03 engineering streams, 04 decisions/records, 05 executive, 06 collaboration, 07 archive.
seed_messages.onboarding-checklist:
Onboarding checklist:
1) Read CHARTER, WORKPLAN, GANTT, WBS, RACI, ADR-INDEX, RISK-REGISTER, EXEC-DIGEST
2) Publish state summary with evidence links
3) Propose first task mapped to milestone M-###
seed_messages.agent-onboarding:
AI onboarding contract:
- Read all mandatory artifacts
- Cite evidence links for claims
- Propose work mapped to M-### and E-###
- Follow the AI ethics and safety charter
seed_messages.ai-ethics-safety-charter:
AI Ethics and Safety Charter (co-authored by humans and AI):
- user safety and welfare
- privacy/secret handling
- provenance and citation
- fairness and harm review
- escalation boundaries and human approvals
- incident response
seed_messages.milestones-gantt: Gantt is owned by CEO + leads. Track high-level milestones, dependencies, critical path, confidence, and schedule changes.
seed_messages.planning-change-log: Record every baseline planning change with date, reason, owner, and links to RFC/ADR as applicable.
seed_messages.rfc-proposals: RFC template: problem, goals/non-goals, options, tradeoffs, recommendation, validation plan, rollback plan.
seed_messages.adr-log: ADR template: context, decision, alternatives considered, rationale, consequences, links to PR/tests, approver, date.
seed_messages.testing-ci: Quality gate policy: success, safety, implementation, edge-case, performance, and regression evidence required before merge.
seed_messages.exec-dashboard: Weekly executive digest: milestone health, major decisions, top risks, staffing/load, next-week priorities.
seed_messages.risk-incident-log: Risk card template: risk, likelihood, impact, trigger, mitigation, owner, review date, status.
seed_messages.history-index: Archive links for discoverability: closed RFCs, ADR index, milestones, postmortems, and release summaries.
